"T:The Chocolate Way 2017":
"An unusual phenomenon has occurred near
the Valentine's Day venue in the Volcanic
Caves of planet Amduscia, leading to
abnormal environmental changes.
These changes have caused a large
number of enemies to appear in the area.
All ARKS are to repel these enemies and
try to regain control of the situation.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"

"An unusual phenomenon is occurring
around the event venue. Impossible
things are being embodied all over
the place, throwing the site into chaos!"

"As a result, a large number of
enemies have appeared! You need
to hurry up and stop them before
they escape from the area!"

"Other ARKS have been caught
up in this phenomenon too! If
you run into them, help them!"
